summary:
I made certified translations of documents like diplomas, driving licenses or identity cards from Chinese into Dutch or from Dutch into Chinese from 1993 until 2010. Now I am not registered as a certified translator.
I can however make non-certified translations from Chinese, Vietnamese, Hebrew, German or English to Dutch. I use Trados Studio 2014 Freelance and Wordfast Anywhere.
